# Load packages

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
```

# Load data

```{r}
escooters_precovid <-
  read_csv('raw_data/escooters-precovid.csv',
           col_types = cols(
             StartDate = col_date(format = '%Y-%m-%d'),
             EndDate = col_date(format = '%Y-%m-%d'),
             StartTime = col_time(format = '%H:%M'),
             EndTime = col_time(format = '%H:%M'),
             HourNum = col_double()
           )
  ) %>%
  as_tibble()

escooters_postcovid <-
  read_csv('raw_data/escooters-postcovid.csv',
           col_types = cols(
             StartDate = col_date(format = '%Y-%m-%d'),
             EndDate = col_date(format = '%Y-%m-%d'),
             StartTime = col_time(format = '%H:%M'),
             EndTime = col_time(format = '%H:%M'),
             HourNum = col_double()
           )
  ) %>%
  as_tibble()
```
